x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 2 |  | lsmless2.s | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_submrcl | |- ( U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpll | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> T C_ B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> x e. T ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> x e. B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 10 | 1, 8, 9 | #P_mndrid | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ x e. B ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) = x ) |
| 11 | 4, 7, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) = x ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_submss | |- ( U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> U C_ B ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> U C_ B ) |
| 14 | 9 | #P_subm0cl | |- ( U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> ( 0g ` G ) e. U ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> ( 0g ` G ) e. U ) |
| 16 | 1, 8, 2 | #P_lsmelvalix | |- ( ( ( G e. Mnd /\ T C_ B /\ U C_ B ) /\ ( x e. T /\ ( 0g ` G ) e. U ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) e. ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 17 | 4, 5, 13, 6, 15, 16 | #P_syl32anc | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) e. ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 18 | 11, 17 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) /\ x e. T ) -> x e. ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_ex | |- ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) -> ( x e. T -> x e. ( T .(+) U ) ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_ssrdv | |- ( ( T C_ B /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) -> T C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
